attributes.action: Intervene in the proposed changes to the Isle of Wight education system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These changes as put to us the parents of school aged children on the Isle of Wight are ill concived and have caused a climate of fear with in all parts of the community, staff and pupils. Educators should of been consulted when the three options were concived of. Primary schools are being punished for the failings of middle and high schools.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Island-Schools/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
